name: Fire And Thunder
detailed_description:
Check out

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1103610/Sailor_Simulator/


About the Game

Unleash your destructive powers and kill your Masters. Use old artefacts and awake inner FIRE and THUNDER. Crack the slave chains and break the Eternity Wheel.
  • Explore the ancient cities and dungeons.
  • Travel through mysterious gods land.
  • Use magical artefacts to slaughter enemies.
  • Discover new weapons and it's powers.
  • Defeat gods and their boss puppets.
  • Prove your skills by smooth movement.
